flow.header: Follow our guide to pair your RockStar Games account with the 2FAS app.

menu.title: Please select the method you use to open RockStar Games now

steps.content: Go to **www.rockstargames.com** and log into your account.
Click the account icon in the top right corner to expand the list of options and click **Settings**. You will be taken to the **SETTINGS** tab on the RockStar Social Club website.
Scan the QR code. Scanning the QR code will generate a token in the 2FAS app. Retype it, and then enter your password, then click **Verify**.
Open RockStar Games and log into your account.
Click the account icon in the top right corner to expand the list of options, and click **Settings**. You will be taken to the **SETTINGS** tab on the RockStar Social Club website.
Scan the QR code. Scanning the QR code will generate a token in the 2FAS app. Retype it, and then enter your password, then click **Verify**.
Go to **www.rockstargames.com** and log into your account.
Tap the account icon in the top right corner to expand the list of options, and tap **Settings**. You will be taken to the **SETTINGS** tab on the RockStar Social Club website.
Expand the **PROFILE** tab, choose **2-STEP VERIFICATION** and tap **Setup**.

Copy or rewrite the **Secret Key** and use **Add manually** option below to add RockStar Games to your 2FAS app. Retype the token generated by 2FAS applications and enter your password, then click **Verify**.
